snippet.title: Monopoly Madness - Xbox One Gameplay
snippet.description:
MONOPOLY®, in a way you’ve never seen before. With shorter rounds, race other players across the chaotic streets of Monopoly Town, collect resources, buy and upgrade properties, mess with your opponents, and avoid their tricks to win the race for riches.

This is Madness!

...oh, and the Rabbids return to Monopoly, because of course it's a Ubisoft game.

MONOPOLY (C) Hasbro
Monopoly Madness, Rabbids (C) Ubisoft
Developed by Engine Software
Also released on Steam, Ubisoft Store, Epic Games Store, PS4, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch

#monopoly #monopolymadness #xbox #xboxone #ubisoft #monopolyxbox #xboxpartygames #xboxonepartygames #xboxonemultiplayer #xboxfamilygames #hasbro
